name: Scenic island hikes, mountains, and cultural festivals
summary: Seeks out island and mountain landscapes for hiking and photography; shows curiosity for local festivals (e.g., carnivals) and visits historically significant sites.

evidence.snippet: São Miguel Island ... Boys do hiking
Fanal Mountain Madeira ... Witchcraft place indeed
Carnival in Madeira.it was amazing... now very curious what’s happening in Rio
Auschwitz-Birkenau ... давайте не забывать...

name: Historical analysis and realism (armor, films, memory)
summary: Enjoys deep-dive critiques of historical cinema and material culture (armor), alongside reflective engagement with 20th-century history and remembrance.

evidence.snippet: Деконструкция. Клим Жуков ... «Крестоносцы», «Огнём и мечом», «Клеопатра»
Клим Жуков. Латный доспех - феномен Европейского рыцарства
Auschwitz-Birkenau ... давайте не забывать...

name: Underground hard techno / hardtekk and rave culture
summary: High-BPM, industrial/acid techno selections and techno edits of pop classics indicate strong affinity for underground rave energy.

evidence.snippet: This Is Technometal – Lorenzo Raganzini & Paolo Ferrara
5 Mins Of Acid – KI/KI
ALL THAT SHE WANTS (TECHNO) ... YOUNG FOLKS (TECHNO)

name: Post‑Soviet rap and street lyricism
summary: Listens to a wide mix of Russian/Kazakh rap and adjacent scenes, from lyrical storytelling to internet‑age remixes.

evidence.snippet: Скриптонит – Москва любит...; Я не улыбаюсь; Привычка
Oxxxymiron – Тентакли; Город под подошвой; Больше Бена
Miyagi & Andy Panda – Brooklyn; Свора (feat. Скриптонит)

name: 2000s alt/nu‑metal and gaming‑era rock
summary: Returns to cathartic 2000s alt/nu‑metal staples and game‑linked tracks, reflecting a nostalgia streak connected to gaming culture.

evidence.snippet: Korn; Deftones; System of a Down; Breaking Benjamin; Papa Roach
Asian Dub Foundation – Fortress Europe (NFS Underground 1)

name: RPG and strategy game mastery
summary: Actively seeks optimization tips, guides, and lore for role‑playing and strategy games; exhibits retro strategy nostalgia.

evidence.snippet: How Quickly Can You Become a Millionaire in Baldur's Gate 3?
Adamantine Forge Walkthrough | Baldur's Gate 3
Рыцари Ужаса и Феникс #СэрТроглодит #Герои3

name: Russian‑language geopolitics and media commentary
summary: Follows a spectrum of Russian‑language commentators and explainer channels on politics, war, and media, indicating a habit of multi‑angle analysis rather than a single echo chamber.

evidence.snippet: Анатолий Шарий – multiple uploads across the week
Руслан Усачев; Редакция; Правое полушарие Интроверта

name: 90s/00s Eurodance and CIS pop nostalgia
summary: Enjoys classic Eurodance and Russian pop hits, sometimes via modern remixes, reflecting a playful retro streak.

evidence.snippet: ATC – Around the World; Mo-Do – Eins Zwei Polizei; C.C. Catch; Laura Branigan
Алла Пугачёва; Руки Вверх!; Вирус

name: Folk/ethnic fusion and Slavic rave aesthetics
summary: Mix of folk vocals and instruments with electronic beats and rave sensibilities; playful pagan/ethno undertones.

evidence.snippet: Нейромонах Феофан – multiple tracks
Otyken – Phenomenon
